content: The new "common with" info in the search parameters listing at the bottom of each Resource page is interesting, but it also expands the content quite a bit and makes it hard to read at a glance. Especially on small screens. I wonder if we might just say something like "common with 15 resources" and link to a page that provides more detail.
Very useful! It linebreaks for me between "3" and "Resources" (and between "In" and "Common"); you could make the header row white-space: nowrap to take care of that.
